mapper.select: select a.apply_id from apply a ,conference_record cre ,conference_room cro where a.apply_id = cre.apply_id and cro.room_id=#{roomId} and a.room_id = cro.room_id and a.audit_state =1 and (cre.start_time between DATE_SUB(#{startTime}, INTERVAL 29 MINUTE)and DATE_ADD(#{endTime}, INTERVAL 29 MINUTE) or cre.end_time between DATE_SUB(#{startTime}, INTERVAL 29 MINUTE)and DATE_ADD(#{endTime}, INTERVAL 29 MINUTE) or (cre.start_time <= DATE_SUB(#{startTime}, INTERVAL 29 MINUTE) and cre.end_time >= DATE_ADD(#{endTime}, INTERVAL 29 MINUTE)))
